keyword: how many calories in a tamale
title: How Many Calories in a Tamale?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a tamale, with a full nutrition breakdown per tamale, variations in preparation, and helpful FAQs for your diet tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tamale?
assumptions: Average corn masa tamale with pork filling, steamed, approximately 100 g total weight; no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by filling (e.g., pork, chicken, veggie), size, masa recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One average pork tamale contains about 223 calories, mainly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pork tamale?
faqs.a: About 223 kcal for one average-sized pork tamale.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a tamale?
faqs.a: Typically 25 g carbs, 8 g protein, 11 g fat per tamale.
Yes, around 400 mg sodium per tamale due to masa and filling seasonings.

faqs.q: How do veggie tamales compare in calories?
faqs.a: Veggie tamales are often lower, around 173 kcal, with more fiber.

faqs.q: Does tamale size affect calorie count?
faqs.a: Yes; larger tamales (150 g) may have 300+ kcal, smaller ones under 200 kcal.
